definitions.definition: Any element of group 17, i.e. fluorine , chlorine , bromine , iodine , astatine and tennessine .
A light fixture in which the filament is surrounded by an atmosphere of a halogen gas.

main_definition: ( chemistry ) Any element of group 17, i.e. fluorine , chlorine , bromine , iodine , astatine and tennessine .
secondary_definitions: A light fixture in which the filament is surrounded by an atmosphere of a halogen gas.
